text: Odnoho razu vin vnis misto nespodivano, bez vyznavatysya lyudʹmy. Vin znayshov dvokh boryuchykh lyudey; kozhnyy (evreysʹkyy) z yoho lyudey, ta inshykh (yehypet·sʹkyy) z yoho vorohiv. Z yoho lyudey zaklykav yoho dlya dopomohy proty yoho voroha. Moses zakompostuvav yoho, ubyvayuchoho yoho. Vin skazav, "Tse yavlyaye soboyu robotu chorta; vin ye realʹnyy voroh, ta hlybokyy misleader
